segments.text: I feel a bit down looking at this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's so absorbed, missing everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is making such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, damaging the cabinets probably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children, they're in real danger on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could all end in tears if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone noticing the problems?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside contrasts so sadly with this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around and help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These little ones shouldn't have to sneak around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to think of the accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
